Techniques.name: Iron Shadow Step
Techniques.description: A silent movement art that lets the user flicker between shadows for rapid strikes.

Techniques.name: Starfire Palm
Techniques.description: An inner energy technique that ignites attacks with micro-star explosions.

Relics & Artifacts.name: Blackveil Mask
Relics & Artifacts.description: A cursed mask that allows the wearer to see through deception, but slowly erodes their identity.

Tomes & Knowledge.name: Codex of the Abyss
Tomes & Knowledge.description: Forbidden compendium that teaches how to summon abstract entities from the void.

Essences & Cores.name: Frost Serpent Core
Essences & Cores.description: Refined crystal from a slain frost wyrm. Greatly boosts ice affinity.

Titles & Blessings.name: Marked by the Moon
Titles & Blessings.description: Passive title that increases perception during night hours and boosts evasion.

Summons & Contracts.name: Verdant Pact
Summons & Contracts.description: A soul contract with a forest spirit that grants healing and vine-based defense.
